Welcome To My Blog!

My name is Taylor Wu, I started programming in May 2016. I learned how to program at a coding boot camp. After graduating the course, I have found a new passion in web development. Currently I am a student at the University of Utah and I will graduate with a BS in Information Systems in Spring of 2017. During my free time I love to play video games and during the winter I love to go snowboarding. This will be a blog about new technologies that I am learning about. In addtion I will add posts about myself and my life!
